remarks.format: ## Remarks Populate this collection with queries that are run when a message arrives on the endpoint to determine which workflow instance the message should be sent to. This property does not need to be used if custom instance resolution is provided by overriding <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowHostingEndpoint.OnGetInstanceId%2A>.
